data.what_is:
Our Spotlight platform provides much more than CRM only can offer. Spotlight platform covers additional possibilities regarding marketing and interaction with customers.

We know that the future lies in a comprehensive loyalty program that inspires, attracts, and recruits new customers while personalized benefits make the existing ones return and repeat their purchases.
An exceptional Customer Data, Loyalty & Engagement solution takes a shortcut to your sales goals.
Take this chance and entrust the profitability to a proven and largely certain strategy that yields results.
The solution that engages customers on a long-term basis directly boosts your profit and reduces business uncertainty
It is a flexible medium for communication with customers
Offers numerous possibilities for creating segmentation categories of customers
Allows creating, running and managing personalized campaigns through profound understanding of customers' needs and habits
Motivates the members of the loyalty program to spend more
Encourages the activities they take as customers by offering them exactly what they want!
Encourages customers to visit selling points more frequently, activates and reactivates them through loyalty tiers!
Does not let them give up on their brand and guarantees long-term loyalty while at the same time improving customer experience
Brings new customers
Attracts new customers to join through the use of offline and digital gift cards
Boosts sales
This way, a comprehensive Loyalty, Customer & Engagement platform plays the vital role in establishing a strong emotional relationship between the company and its customers placing additional value and bringing benefits to members.

Our loyalty program gives companies a possibility to show a genuine care for their regular customers. With a personalized approach, loyalty program supports the loyalty of customers and diminishes the likelihood of their leaving and choosing other competitive brands.

Loyalty monitors and tracks the habits of your customers assisting you in crafting recommendations and offers that align with their sphere of interests.

Integrated with automated marketing tools, Spotlight Customer Data, Loyalty & Engagement platform enables sending timely and relevant messages via different communication channels.

It provides insight into precise analytics as well as the possibility of integrating the loyalty program into your e-commerce business for easier access and greater interactivity.

Our platform significantly increases the number of conversions in many various ways using RFM and Customer Behavioral principles, incentive awards, and personalized experience.

Our platform generates all customer data and offers endless possibilities for their segmentation. It contributes greatly to the allocation of resources optimally and reduces the possibility of wasting them.

A platform such as this one is equally convenient for both online and in-store retail shops in the process of establishing long-term loyalty and ensuring business certainty.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SpotLight?
Great automation platform, online and offline sales tracking, sending coupons, user activation, ecommerce widget increases conversion like all other marketing automation modules, sending emails, viber and sms messages.

What do you dislike about SpotLight?
The complete software solution is great, without any complaints

What problems is SpotLight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Speed and efficiency, automation and segmentation is excellent, saves time, increases conversion and useful activity
